text: Abrar Qazi is an Indian television actor known for portraying Raghu Jadhav in Gathbandhan and Rudraksh Khurana in Yeh Hai Chahatein. ==Career== Qazi made his film debut in 2018 with Imtiaz Ali's Laila Majnu where he played Zaid. In 2019, he portrayed Raghu Jadhav in Colors TV's Gathbandhan opposite Shruti Sharma. Qazi made his digital debut with Amazon Prime's The Family Man as Kareem. Since December 2019, he has been playing Rudraksh Khurana in Star Plus's Yeh Hai Chahatein opposite Sargun Kaur Luthra. ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !
